verses.roman:
nityānanda kahe,--āmi 'deha' tumi 'prāṇa'
'deha' 'prāṇa' bhinna nahe,--ei ta pramāṇa

synonyms: nityānanda kahe—Lord Nityānanda Prabhu said; āmi—I; deha—the body; tumi—You; prāṇa—the life; deha—the body; prāṇa—the life; bhinna nahe—not separate; ei ta pramāṇa—this is the evidence.
translation: Nityānanda Prabhu replied, "O Lord, You are the life, and I am the body. There is no difference between the body and life itself, but life is more important than the body.
